actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the United States endorses Lake Placid, N.Y., as the site of the 1980 Winter Olympic Games, provided that Olympic plans and activities do not conflict with environmental laws or regulations respecting Adirondack Park.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United States endorse Lake Placid, New York, as the site of the 1980 Winter Olympic Games, provided that Olympic plans and activities do not conflict with environmental laws or regulations respecting Adirondack Park.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the United States endorses Lake Placid, N.Y., as the site of the 1980 Winter Olympic Games, provided that Olympic plans and activities do not conflict with environmental laws or regulations respecting Adirondack Park.
